description: The BizTalkFactory PowerShell Provider is a PowerShell Snap-In for BizTalk Server 2006 R2, BizTalk Server 2009, BizTalk Server 2010 and BizTalk Server 2013 that allows developers and administrators to easily automate routine and complex BizTalk administration tasks such as deploying applications, and managing configuration and run-time data using Windows PowerShell. Administrators can further increase productivity by leveraging the many cmdlets included with BizTalkFactory PowerShell Provider.
summary: A Provider for powershell that allows to administrate your BizTalk Server.
author: flimble
